Step.Definition: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <StorageObject xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <ExplicitKey xmlns="T1.CoreLib.Compatibility.ValueObjects">32be7beb-563d-47c8-a8b4-b79b331286b3</ExplicitKey> <FileLocation>USERS FILES</FileLocation> <FileName>DateTime.txt</FileName> <FileWriteOption Description="Delete existing file">REPLACE</FileWriteOption> <Content>{&VAR_REPORTTIME}</Content> <EnableDecoding>false</EnableDecoding> <DecodeType></DecodeType> </StorageObject>
Step.Name: Save Text
